pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 26 and Saturday, May 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 26 and Saturday, May 27, 2017:

Friday, May 26, 2017

Sigonella, Italy

1:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Sigonella, Italy

Sigonella Military Airport                 

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of arrival

Taormina, Italy

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the French Republic.

San Domenico Palace Hotel
Taormina, Italy

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for the 43rd G7 summit.

Greek Theatre of Taormina
Taormina, Italy

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the G7 Family Photo

Greek Theatre of Taormina
Taormina, Italy

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart the Greek Theatre of Taormina on foot for the San Domenico Palace Hotel.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will be greeted by the Prime Minister of Italy, Paolo Gentiloni, at the San Domenico Palace Hotel.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will witness the Italian Aeronautica Militare (Frecce Tricolori) flypast.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Luncheon.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the Luncheon

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session I.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the session

3:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session II

Closed to media.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minster will attend a concert given by La Scala Philharmonic Orchestra.

Closed to media.

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner given by the President of  Italy, Sergio Mattarella for G7 Leaders.

Closed to media.


Saturday, May 27, 2017

Taormina, Italy

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G7 Working Session with Outreach Countries and International Organizations.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at beginning of the Session

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Family Photo of G7 and Outreach Leaders.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session III.

Closed to media.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Luncheon.

Closed to media.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Municipal Library
Taormina, Italy

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Note: all times local
